column4: Anyone got any information on setting up ATI / AMD video cards Catalyst driver and Xorg.conf?
should be fairly automatic. what card do you have, and which version of ubuntu are you running?
Heh its never straight forward with newer hardware. I'm rockin two AMD Sapphire HD6850's and I want to get my dual monitors working again or at least the darn catalyst driver.
you're right; that's far from straightforward lol
afraid i've never attempted what you are in linux, sorry but i don't think i'd be helpful
I figured since sapphire doesent supply a driver that I could maybe cheap out and go with the amd driver for the HD6850.
i always go with standard amd drivers
I'm thinking that my biggest issue is xorg.conf  If I can figure out how to build a barebones xorg.conf that will recognize my video card's and their identifiers that would be best.
I dont really need spoonfeeding but any suggestions or possible research might help.
Actually have never touched gentoo past an early version like 10 years ago when I first tried using linux.
i really hate to say it but besides snarky humor i probably won't be much help
I have no idea how to address a video card at all lol.  But I know that xorg.conf wants me to do so.
it's just a section in xorg.conf...it's been 3-4 years since i hand-configed an xorg.conf myself
hmm its all good I should probably sleep on this problem and be content with the fact that my computer is working lol... :S grumble grumble.
well thanks for your time and attention either way.
